password: "towel"


PBKDF PART: turning the password into a key and IV.

Since we are not given a salt, we generate a random one:
salt = 306f7fb8d80f57e4

Concatenate password and salt:
towel0o��W�

MD5 hash that:
3e9b8a463a57720df39da2b548b4317d

Split that in half. The left half becomes the key, the right half becomes the IV:
key = 3e9b8a463a57720d
 iv = f39da2b548b4317d


KEY SCHEDULE PART: turing 1 key into 16 subkeys.

We start with our key:
key = 0011111010011011100010100100011000111010010101110111001000001101 (3e9b8a463a57720d)

Run that through permuted choice 1, turing the key from 64-bits to 56-bits:
pc-1 = 00000110011010000101000101110111111110101001100101110011 (06685177fa9973)

Split that into 2 halves of 28-bits:
 left = 0000011001101000010100010111 (0668517)
right = 0111111110101001100101110011 (7fa9973)

Now the 16 rounds. Within each round,
	1) the halves' bits are each rotated left by the number specified in the rotation table
	2) concatenated together again (56-bits)
	3) run through permuted choice 2 (56-bits to 48-bits)

Round 0
	  left = 0000110011010000101000101110 (0cd0a2e)
	 right = 1111111101010011001011100110 (ff532e6)
	catted = 00001100110100001010001011101111111101010011001011100110 (0cd0a2eff532e6)
	  pc-2 = 010001000101111010001000001011111010110010001111 (445e882fac8f)

Round 1
	  left = 0001100110100001010001011100 (19a145c)
	 right = 1111111010100110010111001101 (fea65cd)
	catted = 00011001101000010100010111001111111010100110010111001101 (19a145cfea65cd)
	  pc-2 = 001101000000000111100000001100100011011111111011 (3401e03237fb)

Round 2
	  left = 0110011010000101000101110000 (6685170)
	 right = 1111101010011001011100110111 (fa99737)
	catted = 01100110100001010001011100001111101010011001011100110111 (6685170fa99737)
	  pc-2 = 100100100100100000110101111111111011100100100011 (924835ffb923)

Round 3
	  left = 1001101000010100010111000001 (9a145c1)
	 right = 1110101001100101110011011111 (ea65cdf)
	catted = 10011010000101000101110000011110101001100101110011011111 (9a145c1ea65cdf)
	  pc-2 = 100011010010001100010100011001100110111101111010 (8d2314666f7a)

Round 4
	  left = 0110100001010001011100000110 (6851706)
	 right = 1010100110010111001101111111 (a99737f)
	catted = 01101000010100010111000001101010100110010111001101111111 (6851706a99737f)
	  pc-2 = 000001100001011010101101011111011011100101011110 (0616ad7db95e)

Round 5
	  left = 1010000101000101110000011001 (a145c19)
	 right = 1010011001011100110111111110 (a65cdfe)
	catted = 10100001010001011100000110011010011001011100110111111110 (a145c19a65cdfe)
	  pc-2 = 110110110001000001100000111001011101010011111010 (db1060e5d4fa)

Round 6
	  left = 1000010100010111000001100110 (8517066)
	 right = 1001100101110011011111111010 (99737fa)
	catted = 10000101000101110000011001101001100101110011011111111010 (851706699737fa)
	  pc-2 = 100010001100101011101000010011011011111001101111 (88cae84dbe6f)

Round 7
	  left = 0001010001011100000110011010 (145c19a)
	 right = 0110010111001101111111101010 (65cdfea)
	catted = 00010100010111000001100110100110010111001101111111101010 (145c19a65cdfea)
	  pc-2 = 100100000111001100001110101111101101110011111100 (90730ebedcfc)

Round 8
	  left = 0010100010111000001100110100 (28b8334)
	 right = 1100101110011011111111010100 (cb9bfd4)
	catted = 00101000101110000011001101001100101110011011111111010100 (28b8334cb9bfd4)
	  pc-2 = 001101100000111010000110110110110111110000101110 (360e86db7c2e)

Round 9
	  left = 1010001011100000110011010000 (a2e0cd0)
	 right = 0010111001101111111101010011 (2e6ff53)
	catted = 10100010111000001100110100000010111001101111111101010011 (a2e0cd02e6ff53)
	  pc-2 = 011110100011000000010000111011000111101110111000 (7a3010ec7bb8)

Round 10
	  left = 1000101110000011001101000010 (8b83342)
	 right = 1011100110111111110101001100 (b9bfd4c)
	catted = 10001011100000110011010000101011100110111111110101001100 (8b83342b9bfd4c)
	  pc-2 = 000011001000010001111100101100010111101001111111 (0c847cb17a7f)

Round 11
	  left = 0010111000001100110100001010 (2e0cd0a)
	 right = 1110011011111111010100110010 (e6ff532)
	catted = 00101110000011001101000010101110011011111111010100110010 (2e0cd0ae6ff532)
	  pc-2 = 110001100100000000011110111101111001101010110010 (c6401ef79ab2)

Round 12
	  left = 1011100000110011010000101000 (b833428)
	 right = 1001101111111101010011001011 (9bfd4cb)
	catted = 10111000001100110100001010001001101111111101010011001011 (b8334289bfd4cb)
	  pc-2 = 001011101000101100100000100101010010111101111111 (2e8b20952f7f)

Round 13
	  left = 1110000011001101000010100010 (e0cd0a2)
	 right = 0110111111110101001100101110 (6ff532e)
	catted = 11100000110011010000101000100110111111110101001100101110 (e0cd0a26ff532e)
	  pc-2 = 100010100011100000101011001111111011101011010100 (8a382b3fbad4)

Round 14
	  left = 1000001100110100001010001011 (833428b)
	 right = 1011111111010100110010111001 (bfd4cb9)
	catted = 10000011001101000010100010111011111111010100110010111001 (833428bbfd4cb9)
	  pc-2 = 101010010010011001011000011100011110010111110111 (a9265871e5f7)

Round 15
	  left = 0000011001101000010100010111 (0668517)
	 right = 0111111110101001100101110011 (7fa9973)
	catted = 00000110011010000101000101110111111110101001100101110011 (06685177fa9973)
	  pc-2 = 001100010101000010011110111101101111101110001101 (31509ef6fb8d)

The pc-2 values are your subkeys for encryption mode:
subkey[ 0] = 445e882fac8f
subkey[ 1] = 3401e03237fb
subkey[ 2] = 924835ffb923
subkey[ 3] = 8d2314666f7a
subkey[ 4] = 0616ad7db95e
subkey[ 5] = db1060e5d4fa
subkey[ 6] = 88cae84dbe6f
subkey[ 7] = 90730ebedcfc
subkey[ 8] = 360e86db7c2e
subkey[ 9] = 7a3010ec7bb8
subkey[10] = 0c847cb17a7f
subkey[11] = c6401ef79ab2
subkey[12] = 2e8b20952f7f
subkey[13] = 8a382b3fbad4
subkey[14] = a9265871e5f7
subkey[15] = 31509ef6fb8d

For decryption mode, you just invert the subkeys' order:
subkey[ 0] = 31509ef6fb8d
subkey[ 1] = a9265871e5f7
subkey[ 2] = 8a382b3fbad4
subkey[ 3] = 2e8b20952f7f
subkey[ 4] = c6401ef79ab2
subkey[ 5] = 0c847cb17a7f
subkey[ 6] = 7a3010ec7bb8
subkey[ 7] = 360e86db7c2e
subkey[ 8] = 90730ebedcfc
subkey[ 9] = 88cae84dbe6f
subkey[10] = db1060e5d4fa
subkey[11] = 0616ad7db95e
subkey[12] = 8d2314666f7a
subkey[13] = 924835ffb923
subkey[14] = 3401e03237fb
subkey[15] = 445e882fac8f
